title: Appaloosa AVCHD 720p
description:
Included is the BDMV folder to create a dual layer AVCHD disk using Imgburn or Nero with UDF 2.5

using imgburn: 
use write files/folders to disk. 
Browse for folders and include the BDMV, and optionally a blank Certificate folder with a blank BACKUP folder inside the CERTIFICATE folder. 
In options tab set settings filesystem as UDF and revision to 2.5. 
Use a dual layer dvd and burn.

This will play nicely with your PS3 or any Bluray player that supports AVCHD (most do).

Resolution is 720p mastered with 7000kbps high quality encoding. 
Sound is Dobly Digital 5.1 640kbs.

Enjoy!
